lead_paragraph: Recognizing the potential shortage, many state high school associations have taken lead roles in recruiting new talent to an aging work force facing startlingly hostile conditions.

headline.main: Referee Shortage Tied to Lack of Respect
headline.print_headline: States Are Seeking to Address a Referee Shortage Linked to Hostile Conditions

snippet: Recognizing the potential shortage, many state high school associations have taken lead roles in recruiting new talent to an aging work force facing startlingly hostile conditions.
